page.title: 13CALEY HOUSE KILWINNING
page.content: {CALEY HOUSE was opened in 1984 on the {site of the old Caledonian Railway {Station.}It is conveniently near to bus and train and the shopping centre.Shaped like the old booking hall, it was designed and built by Irvine Development Corporation and cost one{million pounds.}The architect was Roan Rutherford and the main contractor was Farrans (construction) Ltd. The official construction time was 56 weeks but it took a few weeks longer than that. The front of the building is glass, giving it a very impressive facade. There is housing for{60 people}in accommodation ranging from four person flats to one-person flats. There are many recreations available such as a game/disco hall, a snooker room and an outdoor games pitch.
